channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for ID

item.title: Report X-2025040884
item.description:
Report X-2025040884

Identified by scraper @ 2025-05-07T21:14:44+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-04-08
  • City: BOISE
  • State: ID
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDED TO AN AIR PACKAGE THAT HAD TWO DIFFERENT TRACKING LABELS APPLIED WITH TWO DIFFERENT ACCOUNT NUMBERS AND CONSIGNEES. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED THREE NEON MULTI-PURPOSE REFILLABLE LIGHTERS CONTAINING BUTANE. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX. THE PACKAGE WAS DROPPED OFF IN TEXAS AND IS NOW SUSPECTED OF BEING FRAUDULENTLY TENDERED. ONE TRACKING NUMBER IS 1Z855WX20174034585. THERMAL LABEL SHIPPER IS 1 SK, 250 HARWIN DR STE C, OUSTON, OUSTON TX 77036. SHIP TO IS PAULA M BALDERSON, 2765789550, 2452 MILL CREEK RD, COUNCIL ID 83612-5222. THE OWNER OF ACCOUNT 855WX2 IS ADONIS PRECISION, INC, 25 REGENCY OAKS BLVD, ROCHESTER NY 14624-5902. THE ADDITIONAL TRACKING NUMBER ON THE PACKAGE IS 1Z6X2W030185093338. THERMAL LABEL SHIPPER IS UMZEE GROUP, 019 OWL ECHO CT, OUSTON TX 77082. SHIP TO IS DORIE TCHOURUMOFF, 3770983332, 122 SQUIRREL TREE LN, MOUNT LAUREL NJ 08054-2112. THE OWNER OF THIS ACCOUNT IS 6X2W03 IS KRISTINA CLARK, 1131 JACKSON AVE, TUSCALOOSA AL 35401.
